p:
Early homology models of SARS-CoV-2 M pro indicated close structural relation to other coronaviral main proteases.
69 Amino acid sequence alignments reveal ~99% identity with BatCoV RaTG13 M pro and ~96% with the previous SARS-CoV M pro. In contrast, sequence identity with MERS-CoV M pro is only ~50% ( Fig. 2 ).
